description:
On a remote island in the Orange Archipelago an expedition team attempted to find some Kabuto Fossils. The team was led by Nurse Joy and a camera crew filmed their expedition and would be broadcasted on the PXTV channel.
On their expedition they encountered some strange occurances including falling boulders which they later discovered was being done by a local man called Umberto who was attempting to drive them off the island.
Umberto warned the team that they would turn the moon red and the island would sink if they were to disturb the Kabuto fossils.
The team managed to locate the Kabuto fossils but upon disturbing the Kabuto fossils the moon turned red and the island began to sink. The Kabuto than managed to revived themselves and swim away from the island.
name: Expedition Team
